topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5399323563687218544b0000#post_5399323563687218544b0000
That is because it is from an era where rap was generally respectable as a genre.

Rap for me is like country, where I used to think I just hated all of it till I had my horizons broadened and realized that no, I don't hate it. I just hate the soulless, commercially driven pseudo pop drivel that gets passed off as rap and played on the radio.
